alert.note: Alert for Marion (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 2:58PM CDT until June 24 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Marion County in south central Iowa... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pleasantville, or 6 miles west of Knoxville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Knoxville Municipal Airport around 305 PM CDT. Knoxville and Knoxville Raceway around 310 PM CDT. Lake Red Rock around 315 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Elk Rock State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and south central Iowa.
